In week 4, we will discuss how to work with R packages (we have already done so, but now want to discuss packages more formally) and cover some programming structures. In particular, the following topics will be covered:

- check what packages are installed
- how to install packages from CRAN
- difference between a package and a library
- CRAN task views
- updating packages
- searching for packages
- where / how to get help
- reproducible examples
- masking
- for-loops
- if-else statements
- while statements
- generating random numbers

The R script for this tutorial:

- [intro_to_r_week_4.r](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9qt6k44s7i74o5s/intro_to_r_week_4.r?dl=1)

The datasets for this tutorial:

- [data_survey_edit.rdata](https://www.dropbox.com/s/yg6sf2yei7s544x/data_survey_edit.rdata?dl=1)
- [mirnadata.rdata](https://www.dropbox.com/s/e698ayslcpgsp2v/mirnadata.rdata?dl=1)
